A.H., Appellant,
v.
In re: the Matter of the Adoption of E.I.C.C., Appellee. Case No. 5D17-907 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fifth District. Decision filed August 21, 2018
Rehearing Denied December 18, 2018 Nicholas A. Shannin and Carol B. Shannon, of Shannin Law Firm, P.A., Orlando, for Appellant. Cristina Alonso, of Alonso Appeals, Pembroke Pines; Patricia Hernandez and Nora Rotella, of Rotella & Hernandez, LLC, Miami, for Appellee, D.C. Brian J. Kruger and Luis E. Insignares, of Luis E. Insignares, P.A., Fort Myers; Elizabeth Lynn Littrell, of Lambda Legal Defense & Education Fund, Inc., Atlanta, GA, Amici Curiae, on behalf of Appellee, D.C. PER CURIAM.

AFFIRMED.

SAWAYA and WALLIS, JJ., concur.

BERGER, J., dissents without opinion.
